product_name: SmartWool Nailhead Grid Socks - Men's - 2014 Closeout
long_description: Made using WOW technology, the cushioned Nailhead Grid socks are spruced up with a tonal pattern. Merino wool fibers keep your feet dry at any business or casual function.
